explanation: [0-0] On a light brown surface, a right hand holds a red Japanese bath bomb package, while the left hand tears open the top of the bag.

[0-2] After tearing open the package, a pink sphere wrapped in plastic is taken out. The plastic wrap is then removed, and the sphere is held in the left hand while the right hand uses a blue electric engraving tool to carve a line on the sphere.
